data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Burgenland
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Burgenland, Austria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Burgenland.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Burgenland, Austria a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 1,601 believers in Burgenland against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Persian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Persian people.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Burgenland, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Burgenland. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Burgenland, Austria today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
